import React from "react"; import "./MestesugulVietiiPage.css"; import PaymentPopUp from "./PaymentPopUp.jsx"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Basket(props) { const { cartItems, onAdd, onRemove } = props; const itemsPrice = cartItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.price * c.qty, 0); const taxPrice = itemsPrice * 0.19; const shippingPrice = itemsPrice > 250 ? 0 : 25; const totalPrice = itemsPrice + taxPrice + shippingPrice; return (

Cosul Tau

{cartItems.length === 0 &&
Cosul tau este gol
}
{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.name}
{item.qty} x {item.price.toFixed(2)} RON
))} {cartItems.length !== 0 && ( <>

{itemsPrice.toFixed(2)} RON
TVA

Transport
{shippingPrice.toFixed(2)} RON
Total
{totalPrice.toFixed(2)} RON
)}
); }
